hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\blue{1+5}&\blue{=15}\\
\blue{6}&\blue{=15}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $6$ is not the same as $15$.

$\begin{align}
\purple{3+2}&\purple{=6}\\
\purple{5}&\purple{=6}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $5$ is not the same as $6$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{10+5}&\pink{=15}\\
\pink{15}&\pink{=15}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $15$ is the same as $15$.
